9 Dec 2016

Coins from India - Commemorative Coins

Thanks to the many people who have contributed to this collection.

The coins might be ordered in a haphazard manner below. That is because it is tabulated the way I have stored them in my collection. Do note that their documentation is not complete. I have unfortunately not taken images of the coins available in this collection so far, but I plan to do so very soon :-)

#Denomination Coin Name Year Quantity
1 One Rupee Jawaharlal Nehru Cemetery 1989 1
2 Five Rupee Food and Agriculture Organisation 1945-1995 1
3 Five Rupee 8th world Tamil conference - saint thiruvalluvar 1995 2
